item.description:
Join us for an evening of scintillating music and soulful meditation guaranteed to leave you refreshed & enthused. Siddharth Joshi of the "Jammin' With You!" school of music & Chuck Foster of The Art of Living foundation are teaming up to bring this electrifying evening to Bostonians.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Tickets are available for just $5, and can be purchased at http://musicnmeditationmixer.eventbrite.com/. All proceeds from the evening will be donated to the "Empowered Voices" project,an ongoing community development initiative in Kyakasangulu, Uganda supported by the Art of Living Foundation.

 

About the project:

Ugandan women in the village of Kyakasangulu need a hand in establishing fair trade of their handmade jewelry and housewares. With economic independence, these families will be prepared for the mounting challenges that face their African village. With the support of IAHV, the Massachusetts based NGO 'Empowered Voices' is helping these women start small businesses and market their products in Uganda and in the US. Learn more about the project at http://empowered-voices.org/.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

So, come, indulge your senses and contribute to a worthy cause!

 

In service,

The Art of Living Foundation
item.name: Music n Meditation Mixer
